about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Token Pack 158: Adventuring Animals

Canine swordmasters, Feline archers, and mysterious monkey men, adventuring animals 2 is waiting to join your next expedition to the far of lands! This pack 25 anthropomorphic animals of various species and genders, all equipped with a variety of martial weapons and dynamic poses certain to liven up your next encounter be they friend or foe! Have a howling good time and add them to your campaign now!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
